entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
